title: 1.1 million people have been laid off in the US this year — more than any year since the pandemic
description: 2025 has seen the most layoffs in the US since the pandemic, after over 70,000 jobs were cut in November, according to Challenger, Gray & Christmas.
content:
There were over 70,000 job cuts last month.Joe Raedle/Getty Images
  • 2025 has seen over 1.1 million job cuts in the US so far, according to Challenger, Gray & Christmas.
  • The firm said … [+1328 chars]
